verses.name: 2 Samuel 14:22
verses.text: And Joab fell to the ground on his face, and bowed himself, and thanked the king: and Joab said, To day thy servant knoweth that I have found grace in thy sight, my lord, O king, in that the king hath fulfilled the request of his servant.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 14:23
verses.text: So Joab arose and went to Geshur, and brought Absalom to Jerusalem.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 14:24
verses.text: And the king said, Let him turn to his own house, and let him not see my face. So Absalom returned to his own house, and saw not the king’s face.
